00008 #ifndef STXXL_MALLOC_H
00009 #define STXXL_MALLOC_H
00010 
00011 #include "stxxl/bits/namespace.h"
00012 
00013 #include <ostream>
00014 #include <malloc.h>
00015 #include <cstdlib>

00017 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00018 
00019 
00021 
00023 class malloc_stats
00024 {
00025 public:
00026     typedef int return_type;
00027 
00029     return_type from_system_nmmap() const
00030     {
00031         struct mallinfo info = mallinfo();
00032         return info.arena;
00033     }
00034 
00036     return_type free_chunks() const
00037     {
00038         struct mallinfo info = mallinfo();
00039         return info.ordblks;
00040     }
00041 
00043     return_type used() const
00044     {
00045         struct mallinfo info = mallinfo();
00046         return info.uordblks;
00047     }
00048 
00050     return_type not_used() const
00051     {
00052         struct mallinfo info = mallinfo();
00053         return info.fordblks;
00054     }
00055 
00057     return_type releasable() const
00058     {
00059         struct mallinfo info = mallinfo();
00060         return info.keepcost;
00061     }
00062 
00064     return_type max_allocated() const
00065     {
00066         struct mallinfo info = mallinfo();
00067         return info.usmblks;
00068     }
00069 
00071     return_type fastbin_blocks() const
00072     {
00073         struct mallinfo info = mallinfo();
00074         return info.smblks;
00075     }
00076 
00078     return_type fastbin_free() const
00079     {
00080         struct mallinfo info = mallinfo();
00081         return info.fsmblks;
00082     }
00083 
00085     return_type from_system_mmap() const
00086     {
00087         struct mallinfo info = mallinfo();
00088         return info.hblkhd;
00089     }
00090 
00092     return_type mmap_chunks() const
00093     {
00094         struct mallinfo info = mallinfo();
00095         return info.hblks;
00096     }
00097 
00099     return_type from_system_total() const
00100     {
00101         return from_system_nmmap() + from_system_mmap();
00102     }
00103 };
00104 
00106 inline std::ostream & operator << (std::ostream & s, const malloc_stats & st)
00107 {
00108     s << "MALLOC statistics" << std::endl;
00109     s << "=================================================================" << std::endl;
00110     s << "Space allocated from system not using mmap: " << st.from_system_nmmap() << " bytes" << std::endl;
00111     s << "       number of free chunks                       : " << st.free_chunks() << std::endl;
00112     s << "       space allocated and in use                  : " << st.used() << " bytes" << std::endl;
00113     s << "       space allocated but not in use              : " << st.not_used() << " bytes" << std::endl;
00114     s << "       top-most, releasable (via malloc_trim) space: " << st.releasable() << " bytes" << std::endl;
00115     s << "       maximum total allocated space (?)           : " << st.max_allocated() << " bytes" << std::endl;
00116     s << "   FASTBIN blocks " << std::endl;
00117     s << "       number of fastbin blocks: " << st.fastbin_blocks() << std::endl;
00118     s << "       space available in freed fastbin blocks: " << st.fastbin_free() << " bytes" << std::endl;
00119     s << "Space allocated from system using mmap: " << st.from_system_mmap() << " bytes" << std::endl;
00120     s << "       number of chunks allocated via mmap(): " << st.mmap_chunks() << std::endl;
00121     s << "Total space allocated from system (mmap and not mmap): " <<
00122     st.from_system_total() << " bytes" << std::endl;
00123     s << "=================================================================" << std::endl;
00124     return s;
00125 }
